title: Chicken with spinach
description: Try this healthy curry recipe packed full of spinach goodness.Each serving provides 266kcal, 33g protein, 6.5g carbohydrate (of which 6g sugars), 11g fat (of which 1.5g saturates), 4g fibre and 0.6g salt.
ingredients: 3-4 green chillies, pricked with a knife
1 head garlic, peeled, cloves left whole
salt and freshly ground black pepper
basmati rice, cooked according to packet instructions, to serve
